results.title: Diabetes Mellitus in a Patient With Lafora Disease: Possible Links With Pancreatic beta-Cell Dysfunction and Insulin Resistance
results.text_hl: The formation of @GENE_EPM2A @GENE_7957 @@@EPM2A@@@ and @GENE_NHLRC1 @GENE_378884 @@@malin@@@ signaling complex promotes the ubiquitination of proteins participating in @CHEMICAL_Glycogen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006003 @@@glycogen@@@ metabolism, where dysfunctional mutations lead to the formation of @<m>DISEASE_Lafora_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020192 @@@LBs@@@. Herein, we describe a 13-years-old child with @<m>DISEASE_Lafora_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020192 @@@LD@@@ due to a @GENE_NHLRC1 @GENE_378884 @@@NHLRC1@@@ (@VARIANT_p.P129H_NHLRC1_human @VARIANT_tmVar:c|SUB|C|386|A;HGVS:c.386C>A;VariantGroup:0;OriginalGene:105193;CorrespondingGene:378884;RS#:750465793;CorrespondingSpecies:10090;CA#:316031 @@@c.386C > A@@@, @VARIANT_p.P129H_NHLRC1_human @VARIANT_tmVar:p|SUB|P|129|H;HGVS:p.P129H;VariantGroup:0;OriginalGene:105193;CorrespondingGene:378884;RS#:750465793;CorrespondingSpecies:10090;CA#:316031 @@@p.Pro129His@@@) mutation, who has developed @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ and was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Nicolescu RC, Al-Khawaga S, Minassian BA, Hussain K. Diabetes Mellitus in a Patient With Lafora Disease: Possible Links With Pancreatic beta-Cell Dysfunction and Insulin Resistance Front Pediatr. 2018;6():424. PMID: 30701169
citations.BibTeX: @article{30701169, title={Diabetes Mellitus in a Patient With Lafora Disease: Possible Links With Pancreatic beta-Cell Dysfunction and Insulin Resistance}, author={Nicolescu RC and Al-Khawaga S and Minassian BA and Hussain K}, journal={Front Pediatr}, volume={6}, pages={424}}

results.title: 4-Phenylbutyric acid and metformin decrease sensitivity to pentylenetetrazol-induced seizures in a malin knockout model of Lafora disease.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_4_phenylbutyric_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C075773 @@@4-Phenylbutyric acid@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ decrease sensitivity to @CHEMICAL_Pentylenetetrazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010433 @@@pentylenetetrazol@@@-induced @DISEASE_Seizures @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizures@@@ in a @GENE_NHLRC1 @GENE_105193 @@@malin@@@ knockout model of @<m>DISEASE_Lafora_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020192 @@@Lafora disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Sánchez-Elexpuru G, Serratosa JM, Sanz P, Sánchez MP. 4-Phenylbutyric acid and metformin decrease sensitivity to pentylenetetrazol-induced seizures in a malin knockout model of Lafora disease. Neuroreport. 2017 Mar 22;28(5):268-271. PMID: 28181916
